original_text: And they shall turn the rivers far away; and the brooks of defence shall be emptied and dried up: the reeds and flags shall wither.
korean_text: 강들에서는 악취가 나겠고 애굽의 강물은 줄어들고 마르므로 갈대와 부들이 시들겠으며

sentences.original_text: And they shall turn the rivers far away
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 강들을 멀리 돌릴 것이라

sentences.original_text: and the brooks of defence shall be emptied
the reeds and flags shall wither.
